name: flash-arb-suite
description: - Anchor 0.31.x, Solana 1.18.x, Rust 1.82.0 (pinned) - Owner-only governance + executors allowlist (for route execution & sweeping) - Per-token `TokenPool` (supports multiple pools per same mint via `pool_id`) - Guarded multi-step CPI route (program whitelist, per-trade cap, max hops, profit invariant) - Program-owned vault authority (PDA) with settlement & execution ATAs - Scripts to whitelist verified DEX program IDs (devnet/mainnet sets)
